entry.title: Tuesday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Rain showers beginning near noon. Snow level rising to 1200 metres near noon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries and rain showers ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
